definition: (slang) to act cute
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
to sprout/to bud/to have a strong affection for (slang)/adorable (loanword from Japanese 萌え moe, slang describing affection for a cute character)

sentences.english: This is the moment to play the coquetry.
sentences.chinese: 這，便是賣萌撒嬌的時刻。

sentences.english: Today, trying to be cute, my boyfriend threw a snowball at me.
sentences.chinese: 今天男友賣萌捏了一個雪球朝我砸過來。

sentences.english: Acting cute is an essential living skill.
sentences.chinese: 賣萌是一項重要既生存技能。

sentences.english: Let us ignore the animals and the Aliens.
sentences.chinese: 我們暫且不去討論動物和外星人賣萌是什麼意思。

sentences.english: Also for someone so young, he is a leader.
sentences.chinese: 對別人來說還是個賣萌的年紀，他卻已經是一個領袖。

definition: to act like a spoiled child/to throw a tantrum/to act coquettishly
(coll.) presenting as unfriendly and blunt, but warm and tender inside (loanword from Japanese "tsundere")
to take liberties with a woman/to dally/to assail a woman with obscenities
wretched (esp. appearance)/vulgar
a Lolita (young, cute girl)
adorable/cute/lovely
to bully
naughty/mischievous/unruly
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
dark reddish purple/Internet slang abbr. for 這樣子|这样子[zhe4 yang4 zi5]
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
right or wrong?/Is it right?/OK, yes? (colloquial)
to act stupid/to pretend to be naive
(Beijing dialect) argumentative/unreasonable
affected/unnatural/pretentious
mythical horse/Internet slang for 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
